org.apache.batik.ext.awt.geom

Interface Segment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSegment, Cubic, Linear, Quadradic

    public interface Segment
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    An interface that path segments must implement.
